title: KindRaise
description: KindRaise helps non-profits raise money easily, was developed during a hackathon with a team of five.

title: CliqueShoppa
description: CliqueShoppa is an online reselling platform that enables anyone to start a business from home with zero capital.

title: Micdee
description: Micdee is a real estate company in Sub-Saharan Africa. House agents can put up listings of houses for sale, lease, or rent.

title: Shop.Rhai
description: Shop.Rhai is a fashion brand for modern women, they sell Luxury Urban Outfits! All made in Aba, Nigeria.

title: Purple Letter
description: I wrote a love letter to my longtime crush who lives abroad, but unfortunately, I never received a reply.

title: Todo-list
description: I saw a really nice to-do list design on Dribbble and recreated it with React. Now I use it to plan my tasks for the day.
